item.title: Exercise Presents Double-Edged Sword in Addressing Opioid Addiction
item.description: In the summer of 2019 I had the unique opportunity through the Curious Science Writers program to follow a biomedical research study at the National Institutes of Health, interview a scientist behind the study, and then write a journalism article for teenagers about the importance of the research.
